title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Representative Tennis Training Task Design Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental tennis techniques (forehand, backhand, serve) and understanding of game rules
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can analytically design contact points, speed, and spin of tennis shots in an environment simulating real matches
Learners can apply evaluation criteria reflecting game characteristics (winning patterns, movement trajectories) when designing representative training tasks
Through project-based collaboration, learners can develop training scenarios modeled on actual game data and incorporate peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
